summary: Each year thousands of migrant children enter the U.S. without a parent or guardian. We testified on efforts to address 9 of our prior recommendations related to the Office of Refugee Resettlement's role in caring for unaccompanied children. Our recommendations included: Ensuring care providers are qualified Overseeing and monitoring care facilities Tracking services after the children are released to sponsors The agency fully addressed 5...
title: Unaccompanied Children: Efforts by the Office of Refugee Resettlement to Address GAO Recommendations
